page.title: 05 FARMING:CROPS/LIVESTOCK
page.content: The main crops at the farms in this area are:potatoes,sugarbeet,winter and summer barley,wheat,cabbage,carrots and oilseed rape.Also farmed are peas and leeks. Some farms have beef cattle e.g. Rainford Brook Farm;Rainford Delph Farm;Webster's Farm and Promised Land Farm which all have 30-40 beef cattle each.Red Barn Farm has some sheep and Hyde's Brow Farm and Rookery Farm each have horses stabled there. Many farms get a subsidy from the EEC for oilseed rape(used to make margarine etc.)and some get a cattle subsidy.The farmers are affected by having to keep to an EEC enforced potato acreage quota but,not having any dairy cattle,the milk quota does not apply.The cattle go to the abattoir to be slaughtered,and the vegetables either go to markets or to companies such as Heinz.
